programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: A police officer travels to Vietnam to extradite a suspect and discovers a murderer who has been targeting tourists for years.

programme.title: Outrage Coda
programme.desc: A ferocious power struggle erupts in the top echelons of two crime families.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: An explosive ordnance disposal officer has to bring a bomber to justice.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A bomb disposal officer becomes a suspect in a terrorist attack.

programme.title: Strike Commando
programme.desc: An American soldier, betrayed by his superiors, is sent back to the jungle for a reconnaissance mission.

programme.title: Strike Commando 2
programme.desc: A commando rescues his squad leader from heroin smugglers in Burma.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: A police officer travels to Vietnam to extradite a suspect and discovers a murderer who has been targeting tourists for years.

programme.title: Outrage Coda
programme.desc: A ferocious power struggle erupts in the top echelons of two crime families.

programme.title: Free Hand For A Tough Cop
programme.desc: When a scheming convict is sprung from prison by a cop, they team up to hunt down the former crime partner who's kidnapped a critically ill child.

programme.title: The Big Racket
programme.desc: Sent to a small Italian village to investigate corruption, a police detective finds the locals reluctant to talk to outsiders.

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: The warden of a 2022 prison sends an ex-Marine (Ray Liotta) to a jungle island where inmates are left to die.

programme.title: Heaven's Burning
programme.desc: Gangsters and a vengeful husband (Kenji Isomura) pursue a Japanese bride (Yûki Kudô) and her newly found Australian lover (Russell Crowe).

programme.title: Shin Ultraman
programme.desc: After the accidental death of a human during battle, Ultraman takes on the man's appearance and place at the S-Class Species Suppression Protocol to protect Earth from further threats.
